alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Lake Of The Woods; Roseau; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 12 at 3:43AM CDT until April 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions remain possible. Total snow accumulations greater than inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Marshall, Roseau, Kittson, West Marshall and Lake Of The Woods Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM CDT this afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy snowfall rates and blowing snow may reduce visibilities to a quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Lake Of The Woods; Roseau; West Marshall
